Sarge was angered by the words of Aerotaur.

Sarge: He took my entire army =
and had them killed. All 485 of them. I doubt you've lost more...


  -----=
 Original Message ----- 
  From: Rudra656@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
  Sent: Saturday, June 30, 2001 1:37 PM
  Subject: Re: Chivtron Decis=
ions


  ::Aerotaur::
      "I'm sorry Grounded but Deemos has hurt us too =
many times for me to let 
  him live.  This is all because I let him go the=
 first time he attacked.  As 
  for you Sarge, I have just as much reason t=
o kill him.  In our last fight I 
  lost an arm and a leg defending others.=
  I nearly died because there were 
  bots in the battle that shouldn't hav=
e been there.  I couldn't care less 
  about his lackeys.  Now then, let's =
get to the meeting so we can finish it 
  and start planning our attack."  =
He stands tall glaring at Sarge.

   

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subje=
ct to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
